Looking at each row:

Row 4 (net market share) has a method of "browsing" with windows showing 0.19%. Not matching.

Row 5 (statcounter): windows show 2.66%, not 1.85%.

Row 6 (wikimedia): windows is 0.7%, but other is also 0.42%. So, the percentages are different from the claim which states that when window is 1.85% and other is 0.7%.

Wait, in row 6, "windows" is 0.7% and "other" is 0.42%. That doesn't match the claim where windows should be higher at 1.85% and other lower at 0.7%. So this row isn't relevant.
